continuousQueries: select MODE(txt_value) as txt_value, MAX(num_value) as num_value from /^CONTAINER\..*$/ group by time(1m) into MIN.:series_name
select MODE(txt_value) as txt_value, MAX(num_value) as num_value from /^CONTAINER\..*$/ group by time(1h) into HOUR.:series_name
select MODE(txt_value) as txt_value, MAX(num_value) as num_value from /^PLANET\..*$/ group by time(1m) into MIN.:series_name
